Does a startup deck necessary mean it is a presentation or slideshow?
text:
Hey all,
I'm working on a SaaS application that will allow users to create startup plans and pitches (investor memos) in a written form. I want to call these different plans and pitches they create for their startup "Decks", however I am unsure whether a startup "deck" can be used to describe something that is text and widget-based and not necessarily a slideshow/presentation as in a pitch deck. So guess my question is, would it be OK to call a startup business plan for a deck even though it is not a slideshow?
